issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Fix behavior of convevrt_replace function for empty replacement char
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12882](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12882). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The convert_replace function on Gandiva, when defining an empty replacement char, should be able to replace the invalid chars with an empty string.
